name: Pop Star Runner
description:
You're an intergalactic pop sensation going on tour across the galaxy and performing for your fans! But be careful, the mob is vicious during the afterparty... Outrun your fans and make it to your next venue before your fans catch up!

  • 6 randomly generated levels!
  • Jump and slide to avoid avid fans and and obstacles!
  • Collect music notes to and release a new single to keep them at bay!

Game created for GamesPlusJam 2021 -- Theme: You're the Best!

Download Instructions

Unzip file and run executable

Controls
  • Left mouse button or Space to jump
  • Right mouse button or Shift to slide
  • Middle mouse button or Z to release a single!
Credits
  • Ultimate SFX Bundle by Sidearm Studio
  • Redeem Gold font by Somepx
  • All other assets created during the game jam
